marklogic.body: I would like to see the option to opt out of this program. Give me my money back that I have been paying into this fund for the last 25 years. I'll invest it on my own. I've known for 25 years that there will be no OAS when I am eligible, but am forced to pay for those reaping the benefits now. Who will pay my way in another 25 years...no one! Time to stop the Bleeding on this now along with all the other 'social' programs. Get Off your butts, work and plan for your own retirement. No work = no money to retire with. Simple.
